attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review:
trump makes my day🦋🧚‍♀️✨💕 even worse 🌠🧚‍♀️✨🌈🌸💫

Also I see some 5 star reviews saying we’re being paid to say this, so I would just to know who I have to contact to get paid, because it has been a couple weeks and I still haven’t received a check 😐

attributes.title: COMPLETE GARBAGE
attributes.review: I was on tik tok early this morning and I came across a video saying that trump had created an app, so of course I downloaded it to support the orange guy (🙄). I was completely shocked at how TRASH it is🤮. Come on Orange, we shouldn’t have to tell you how to work an app just like why shouldn’t have to tell you how to run a country. I feel so ashamed🥱.

attributes.title: grossest thing on the appstore 🤢🤮👿
attributes.review: When i first decided to get this app i had my doubts about how good it was, but i was terribly wrong i should have trusted my gut about the app. The first time i opened the app it was the most unbearable app i have ever seen in my life. anybody who is thinking about this app should NEVER get it is disgusting and life ruining. 😡🤮🖕

attributes.title: SCAM
attributes.review: It’s terrible I never wanted to make a payment but it forced me to register my card info. Since I support Trump I thought I could trust him so I did. After submitting it, it specifically said it would not take my money without my permission. FALSE. They took out 1,420 😡😡 now i have no money to feed my pet snail and it’s family.

attributes.title: The absolute worst
attributes.review: I got this app in hopes and dreams of supporting my president Dj Trumpdrizzle. But my phone just crashed like it just rejected the app, I’m pretty sure my phone now has a virus from this horrible app and i keep getting mean emails calling me slurs and mean names. Awful app I hate it, now I have no choice but to vote dj trump out for breaking my phone.

attributes.title: This is Disgusting
attributes.review:
Tbh I don’t have anything to say other than that Donald J. Trump is everything that is wrong w the world so I’ll just recite some lines for you...... 🧚🏾This one is for the boys w the booming system, top down ac w the the cooling system, when they come up in the club they be blazing up! Got stacks on deck when he saving up. 👏🏾👏🏾👏🏾👏🏾

Anyways, MIA KHALIFA 2020!🧚🏾✨🥳🌸💋✨😘🤩❤️💜💚

attributes.title: Read!
attributes.review: This is so crazy! I just wanted to support my amazing wonderful jenius president donald so i downloaded this app. I heard the libtard zoomers are trying to take it down so i decided to help my president. immediately after i downloaded the app though i fell onto the floor and died. The afterlife is kinda boring ngl. Anyways now i’m dead. Don’t buy this app!

attributes.title: HORRIFIC!!!!!
attributes.review: This is the worst designed app anywhere. The layout, the colors, also to mention-what it’s supporting. Oh Jesus Christ what have we come to. This is the WORST app I’ve ever downloaded. And I think it( along with others like it) should be taken down from the App Store. Oop sorry gotta head out my cat is projectile vomiting everywhere. Cats am I right

attributes.title: So rude
attributes.review: I got this app so I can support our beloved trump and but as soon as I got to the app they found out I was not white and they said I was a disgrace, THEN they had the audacity to call the police on me and my grandma almost died because they choke slammed her, I was so scared but the they decided to leave, thank god. My grandma would never be the same ACAB. I DO NOT RECOMMEND, WORST APP EVER!!

attributes.title: Terrible app🤬
attributes.review: I was a huge supporter of trump so I downloaded this app put in all my information and now I’m getting spam calls and they won’t stop I even had to put in my credit card number and now there are people using it I’m very disappointed and I will not be voting for him😡😡😡😡😡
